channel.title: Pi help with dragon claws

item.title: Pi help with dragon claws
item.dc:creator: @ipkonpcp ipkonpcp
item.description:
@ipkonpcp wrote:

hey guys i need some serious help my dragon claws hit 4 times perfect on npcs but only 2 times on players ive tried for hours to figure this out maybe im looking in wrong places could some one please guide me in right direction

here is where i have been looking in combat assistant c.lastNpcAttacked = i; if(c.projectileStage == 0 && !c.usingMagic && !c.castingMagic) { // melee hit damage applyNpcMeleeDamage(i, 1, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { applyNpcMeleeDamage(i, 2, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); } if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { applyNpcMeleeDamage(i, 2, c.previousDamage / 2); } }

also here if(c.projectileStage == 0 && !c.usingMagic && !c.castingMagic) { // melee hit damage applyPlayerMeleeDamage(i, 1, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { applyPlayerMeleeDamage(i, 2, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); } if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { applyPlayerMeleeDamage(i, 2, c.previousDamage / 4); } }

and client class here if(clawDelay == 1) { double damage4 = 0; if(npcIndex > 0) { getCombat().applyNpcMeleeDamage(npcIndex, 1, previousDamage / 2); } if(playerIndex > 0) { getCombat().applyPlayerMeleeDamage(playerIndex, 1, previousDamage / 2); } damage4 = previousDamage % 2; if(damage4 >= 0.001) { previousDamage = previousDamage + 1; damage4 = 0; } if(npcIndex > 0) { getCombat().applyNpcMeleeDamage(npcIndex, 2, previousDamage); } if(playerIndex > 0) { getCombat().applyPlayerMeleeDamage(playerIndex, 2, previousDamage); } clawDelay = 0; specEffect = 0; previousDamage = 0; usingClaws = false; }

[code]if(clawPlayerDelay > 0) {
clawPlayerDelayâ€“;
if (clawPlayerDelay == 0) {
delayedDamage = clawDamage[1];
delayedDamage2 = clawDamage[2];
}

			}

	
	if(clawNPCDelay > 0) {
		clawNPCDelay--;
		if (clawNPCDelay == 0) {
			getCombat().applyNpcMeleeDamage(lastNpcAttacked, 1, clawDamage[1]);
			getCombat().applyNpcMeleeDamage(lastNpcAttacked, 2, clawDamage[2]);
		}
	}[/code]

am i in wrong spot if so please guide me to right spot and also what is wrong with my codes same as npc and npc hits 4x perfectly fine
